title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.2 - Suspension of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.2 - Suspension of regulations

State Regulations

In the event of public emergency occasioned by, but not
limited to, acts of God, acts of war, acts of violence or breaches of the
peace, the commission may by resolution revoke or suspend, in whole or in part, any of these regulations when in its opinion the purposes of the Act will
thereby be furthered or effectuated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
